summary: Certain tech companies appear especially well-positioned for the recovery of brand advertising as marketers are looking for additional information about what they're getting for their money, along with the flexibility to switch out messaging or placements especially as the pandemic rages on, experts say.
headline: These three tech stocks may reap the rewards of a brand advertising rebound

summary: "I've been saying over and over again, they ought to break this company up and bring out value," CNBC's Jim Cramer said on Tuesday.

summary: Ant Group has received approval from the Hong Kong stock exchange for its highly-anticipated initial public offering (IPO), CNBC has confirmed.

summary: The lawsuit will mark the first major antitrust lawsuit against a technology company since the DOJ's case against Microsoft in the late 90s.
headline: DOJ to file antitrust lawsuit against Google

summary: Microsoft is partnering with SpaceX to connect the tech giant's Azure cloud computing network to the growing Starlink satellite internet.

headline: Apple's new iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 Pro are great, but 5G has been oversold
summary: The iPhone 12 launch is a big deal for Apple. Bullish analysts think the company's entering a new "iPhone super cycle."

headline: GM's official run for Tesla starts with its electric Hummer debut Tuesday night
summary: As the Ford Bronco and Jeep Wrangler are set to battle over traditional off-road supremacy next year, General Motors has its sights set on a different competitor: Tesla.

headline: Netflix stock should be avoided if lockdowns lift or a vaccine arrives, analyst says
summary: Alex DeGroote, founder of DeGroote Consulting, said investors should avoid Netflix stock if a vaccine arrives or if lockdowns ease.

headline: Yelp wants to give adult children $2,000 to help move out of their parents' houses
summary: Yelp launched its "Re-Empty the Nest" contest on Tuesday, which promises to award 10 people with $2,000 to cover the costs associated with moving out of the house.

summary: CNBC's Jim Cramer said investors should consider taking profits in major pandemic winners such as Zoom Video Communications and Cloudflare.

headline: Inflation comeback may force Fed to abandon easy money policy much sooner than intended, Wall Street forecaster Jim Bianco warns
summary: Bianco Research's James Bianco warns the economic backdrop could push the Federal Reserve to tighten and upset the stock market.

headline: IBM reports third straight quarter of revenue declines
summary: Revenue declines have returned under new IBM CEO Arvind Krishna as he seeks to sell off part of the company's largest business segment.

headline: What IBM’s next move could be after earnings, according to traders
summary: IBM is set to report earnings after the bell. Ari Wald of Oppenheimer and Delano Saporu of New Street Advisors lay out where the stock heads next.

headline: Meet the entrepreneurs creating a membership-based platform to help women of color succeed at work
summary: Rha Goddess and Deepa Purushothaman created nFormation, a first--of-its-kind membership based app for women of color that's launching in January 2021.
